item.description:
Time: 8:30am to 3:00 pm

The King's Watch guild of travelers has managed to open the magical gate to the distant East- but no sooner had they done so, a call for aid came through. The arid City of Wonders is under siege by adversaries from a dozen different points in time, and nobody knows where they're coming from, though they seem bent on destroying the city! Players will use safe foam weapons as they create and play the roles of fantasy heroes. Battle soldiers and monsters out of mythology, find legendary treasure, and solve mysteries and puzzles in this week long fantasy adventure.

$295 for members, $345 for non-members. Call 781-270-4800 for more info!
item.name: March School Break Adventure - Sands of Time
